trans-unit.source: Discovers attributed parts in a managed code assembly.
trans-unit.target: 探索在 Managed 程式碼組件中的屬性化組件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> is used to parse all the parts present in a specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog>用來剖析所有組件存在於指定的組件。

trans-unit.source: The target assembly can be indicated either by object reference or by path.
trans-unit.target: 物件參考或路徑，可以指示的目標組件。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: This type is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

trans-unit.source: The following code demonstrates the common scenario of an application creating an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> to parse its own assembly.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何建立應用程式的常見的案例<xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog>剖析它自己組件。

trans-unit.source: This is a straightforward way to load parts contained in a single project into the Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF).
trans-unit.target: 這是載入組件包含在單一專案中 Managed Extensibility Framework (MEF) 至直接的方法。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the attributed <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 組件，其中包含要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的屬性化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> class with the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的組件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="assembly" /> was loaded in the reflection-only context.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 已載入至僅限反映的內容中。

trans-unit.source: A string that specifies the code base of the assembly (that is, the path to the assembly file) that contains the attributed <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 指定組件程式碼基底 (也就是組件檔的路徑) 的字串，此組件包含加入 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 物件中的屬性化 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> class with the specified code base.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的程式碼基底，初始化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The assembly referenced by `codeBase` is loaded into the load context.
trans-unit.target: 參考的組件`codeBase`會載入至載入內容。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codeBase" /> is not a valid assembly.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="codeBase" /> 不是有效的組件。

trans-unit.source: -or-
Version 2.0 or earlier of the common language runtime is currently loaded and <paramref name="codeBase" /> was compiled with a later version.
trans-unit.target: 目前已載入 2.0 (含) 以前版本的 Common Language Runtime，而且使用較新版本編譯 <paramref name="codeBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have path discovery permission.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有路徑探索權限。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codeBase" /> could not be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入 <paramref name="codeBase" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="codeBase" /> specified a directory.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="codeBase" /> 指定了目錄。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codeBase" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="codeBase" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codeBase" /> is not found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到 <paramref name="codeBase" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codeBase" /> is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="codeBase" /> 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" /> 所定義的無效字元。

trans-unit.source: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.
trans-unit.target: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that contains the attributed <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects to add to the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 組件，其中包含要加入至 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件的屬性化 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The element used by diagnostics to identify the sources of parts.
trans-unit.target: 診斷識別組件來源所使用的元素。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly whose attributed types are contained in the assembly catalog.
trans-unit.target: 取得其屬性化型別包含在這個組件目錄中的組件。

trans-unit.source: The assembly whose attributed <see cref="T:System.Type" /> objects are contained in the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" />.
trans-unit.target: 其屬性化 <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 物件包含在 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 中的組件。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 傳回可在目錄中逐一查看的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the catalog.
trans-unit.target: 可用來逐一查看目錄的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Conditions that specify which exports to match.
trans-unit.target: 指定要比對之匯出的條件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of exports that match the conditions specified by the import definition.
trans-unit.target: 取得符合匯入定義指定條件的匯出集合。

trans-unit.source: A collection of exports that match the conditions specified by <paramref name="definition" />.
trans-unit.target: 符合 <paramref name="definition" /> 指定條件的匯出集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the display name of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 物件的顯示名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the type and assembly of this <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示此 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog" /> 物件的型別和組件。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets the composition element that this element originated from.
trans-unit.target: 取得從其中產生這個項目的撰寫項目。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 一定是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> instance is cast to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.AssemblyCatalog> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ICompositionElement> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the assembly catalog.
trans-unit.target: 取得組件目錄的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A representation of the assembly catalog.
trans-unit.target: 組件目錄的表示。
